    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static BarProperties builder​(int tick,
                                    int percent)
        Supply some properties to the bossbar
        Parameters:
        tick - the delta between each update (in tick, 1s == 20 ticks)
        percent - will be added to the current progress each delta
        Returns:
        a bossbar properties builder

      • getPercent

        public int getPercent()
        Returns:
        the percent to increase

      • getRepeat

        public int getRepeat()
        Returns:
        the repeat tick can be null (0)

      • getTick

        public int getTick()
        Returns:
        the delta in tick

      • getTitleDelta

        public int getTitleDelta()
        Returns:
        the title delta can be null (0)

      • useMagicColor

        public boolean useMagicColor()
        Can be null (false)
        Returns:
        if use magic color or not

      • useReverse

        public boolean useReverse()
        Can be null (false)
        Returns:
        if use reverse or not

      • withMagicColor

        public BarProperties withMagicColor​(boolean useMagicHack)
        Update current bossbar's color each 1/2 second to display crazy unicorn hack
        Parameters:
        useMagicHack - true YEAH BOY
        Returns:
        a bossbar properties builder

      • withRepeat

        public BarProperties withRepeat​(int time)
        Specify a limit, before ending this bossbar. Used in BarSequence where 0 means infinity
        Parameters:
        time - how many time before ending this sequence
        Returns:
        a bossbar properties builder

      • withReverse

        public BarProperties withReverse​(boolean useReverseOrder)
        Only active if percent if sup than 0, the progress will decrease instead of increase
        Parameters:
        useReverseOrder - to reverse the display
        Returns:
        a bossbar properties builder

      • withTitleUpdate

        public BarProperties withTitleUpdate​(int time)
        Update this title according to specified time (in tick)
        Parameters:
        time - delta between each PacketPlayOutBoss.Action.UPDATE_NAME
        Returns:
        a bossbar properties builder
